# Woman training for a Republican militia

(1936)]]
Woman training for a Republican militia is a famous photograph by German photographer Gerda Taro (1910â€“1937) during the Spanish Civil War in 1936, taken on Somorrostro beach in Barcelona.
The photography depicts a female republican militia member on the Somorrostro beach of la Barceloneta neighborhood.
